thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com | 42 3
thread.title: Georgios Triantafyllidis
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Georgios Triantafyllidis

author: Georgios Triantafyllidis
title: Georgios Triantafyllidis
text:
I bought two mobile phones and one of them was not working properly. It was switching on and off all the time.
I wanted to return the phone and get a refund. I could not get in touch with them. After twenty e-mails they responded and following another 10 e-mails i finally was told where to send the phone. I had to pay for posting the phone back (and that costed me almost half of what the phone was worth). 2 months have passed and after more than 50 e-mails i still have no confirmation whether they received the phone or not and whether i will be refunded. I am still waiting.
That was definitely a Bad – Unacceptable experience. Regarding their customer service definitely unreasonable and rude conduct.
